name: Omit Code Quotes
synccode: <div><div><div>raw {⟪</div><div>def rmCodeQuotesState0 (textList):</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; if (0 == len (textList)):</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; return []</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; else:</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; first = textList [0];</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; rest = textList [1:]</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; if (first == '```'):</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; return rmCodeQuotesState1 (rest)</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; else:</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; return [first] + rmCodeQuotesState0 (rest)</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</div><div>def rmCodeQuotesState1 (textList):</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; if (0 == len (textList)):</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; return []</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; else:</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; first = textList [0];</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; rest = textList [1:]</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; if (first == '```'):</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; return rmCodeQuotesState0 (rest)</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; else:</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; return rmCodeQuotesState1 (rest)</div><div>⟫}</div><div>on ➢❲text❳ {⟪</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; text = message.data.split ('%5Cn')</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; result = rmCodeQuotesState0 (text)</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; self.send (self, '[text]', result, message)</div><div>⟫}</div></div></div><div><br></div>
